page.title: 11THE SCHOOL-SUTTON ST JAMES
page.content: There is an outdoor pool which looks rather sad at the moment, because we go to Wisbech indoor pool instead. The school has five classes, two infant and three junior. Clubs are held in the lunch hour because a lot of our children have to leave promptly at 3.30 on the school buses, so they cannot stay behind after school. The list of clubs includes football, netball, athletics, chess, recorders and keep fit to disco music.We play a good deal of rounders in the summer, and involve ourselves in all sorts of matches and competitions with other schools.
